Texto: 
non-contributory
surgery.  radiation and/or chemotherapy pending
• 2.5 cm right parietal lobe mass with very little enhancement following contrast administration.
• mass has high signal changes on t2 and flair sequences.
oligodendroglioma, who grade 2
• astrocytoma
• metastatic tumor
• abscess
38 year old man who had 5 episodes of left hand and leg numbness lasting, from 3 minutes to 1 hour, over the course of 1 day.
by immunohistochemistry the tumor cells are positive for r132h idh1 mutation, negative for p53, and negative-to-weak for egfr. additional 1p/19q codeletion testing is pending.
